model

Class FilmDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.FilmDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilmDAO

    public class FilmDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilmDAO
    Purpose: The DAO interface lists methods to CRUD (create, get, update, delete) the data in the corresponding table. DAO serves to separate to decouple persistence storage (DB) information from the rest of the application. References: http://www.swtestacademy.com/database-operations-javafx/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H1mePFyqqiE&t=18s
    Version:
    04/12/17
    Author:
    Michael Aring
